description:
Use Scanahand, the font generator for everyone, to make your own (handwriting) fonts in minutes.

Scanahand allows you to generate fonts without the need to know all of the technical details involved. All you need is a printer, a scanner, and a pen. Handwriting fonts and signature fonts can be made within a matter of minutes.
- New Weight Conversion Setting: Adjust font weight with ease.
- Expanded Language Support: Access the interface in even more languages
- Enhanced Glyph Outlines: Streamline and improve the accuracy of glyph outline generation.
- Improved Font Export: Faster, more reliable export of your font files.
- High-DPI Optimization: Sharper visuals and better scaling on high-resolution displays.
- General Enhancements: A collection of smaller fixes and performance improvements.
